title: [User Guide for Agencies] High opportunity product pool
content:
As a TikTok Affiliate Program (TAP) agency, finding products that are likely to perform well across different campaign types takes time. The High opportunity product pool helps solve this problem. ## What It Is The High opportunity product pool is an aggregator tool that brings together products with strong sales and commission potential from all campaign types - Seller, Agency, Exclusive TikTok shop, and more. ## Key Features and Benefits 1. **Find Products That Perform**: Access carefully selected products from all your campaigns in one tab. Instead of searching through multiple campaign types separately, you'll spot promising products quickly. 2. **Choose Products With Confidence**: See products from different campaigns side-by-side and easily identify ones with attractive commission rates. Add them to your campaigns with just a few clicks. 3. **Run Better Campaigns**: Focus on products chosen for their performance potential. Add them to your campaigns easily and spend less time searching for good options. 4. **Work Well with Creators**: Give products to creators and set their commission rates in one place. Create and share product lists directly through the platform instead of sending individual links from different campaign types. ## How it works **Step 1:** If you already have a TikTok Shop Partner Center account, navigate to Product Management and select high opportunity products. You will be able to search for products by name/id/shopname/shopcode/campaign name/campaign id
**Step 2:** Use the advanced filters for more granular results. ![Image](https://p16-arcosite-va.ibyteimg.com/tos-maliva-i-10qhjjqwgv-us/b7b7de1290264a8195ff22a7930a2235~tplv-10qhjjqwgv-image.image) **Step 3:** A product could belong to multiple campaigns, choose the campaign you would like to join and click "Select"
**Step 4:** Once you have selected the product and joined the campaign, the product will appear under Selected Products and you can set your commission ![Image](https://p16-arcosite-va.ibyteimg.com/tos-maliva-i-10qhjjqwgv-us/40772885cf05414c8decb9fd8a3f4464~tplv-10qhjjqwgv-image.image) ![Image](https://p16-arcosite-va.ibyteimg.com/tos-maliva-i-10qhjjqwgv-us/dd0dd143b14a48949eeaa79a97296605~tplv-10qhjjqwgv-image.image) **Step 5:** You can create a product list by selecting multiple products and copying the link and sending it to creators ![Image](https://p16-arcosite-va.ibyteimg.com/tos-maliva-i-10qhjjqwgv-us/99ccf715689645f0bdb5219387ccf017~tplv-10qhjjqwgv-image.image) ![Image](https://p16-arcosite-va.ibyteimg.com/tos-maliva-i-10qhjjqwgv-us/1b22dfe9d9e84a8182e874a187750c31~tplv-10qhjjqwgv-image.image) **Creator's Experience:** If you send the creator a product list, they will see a list of products. If you send them just one product, they will see that single product. ![Image](https://p16-arcosite-va.ibyteimg.com/tos-maliva-i-10qhjjqwgv-us/e1abe350426a4c658aa6541cbfaefa5c~tplv-10qhjjqwgv-image.image) ![Image](https://p16-arcosite-va.ibyteimg.com/tos-maliva-i-10qhjjqwgv-us/02121d5cf4e84df29f383ddfec012a76~tplv-10qhjjqwgv-image.image)
